title: Data Structures & Algorithms Fundamentals
summary: Master the foundational data structures (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs) and essential algorithms every software engineer must know.
description: Data structures are the backbone of efficient programming. This course teaches you the fundamental building blocks: arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs. You'll understand when and how to use each structure, and implement classic algorithms that power real-world applications.
body:
Learn the foundations that every top-tier software engineer must master.

Who This Course Is For
Beginning software engineers, computer science students, and developers preparing for technical interviews.

What You'll Learn
✅ Understand arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues in depth
✅ Master tree structures (binary trees, BSTs, balanced trees)
✅ Learn graph representation and traversal algorithms
✅ Analyze time and space complexity using Big O notation
✅ Solve classic algorithmic problems efficiently

Course Outline
Module 1: Big O Notation & Complexity Analysis
Module 2: Linear Data Structures (Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues)
Module 3: Tree Structures & Traversals
Module 4: Graph Algorithms & Shortest Path
ogDescription: Master arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, and Big O notation. Perfect for interview prep.
prerequisites: Proficiency in any programming language (Python, Java, C++, JavaScript)

title: LeetCode Problem Solving & Interview Prep
summary: Solve real LeetCode problems and master the patterns used by FAANG companies in technical interviews.
description: LeetCode is where top engineers practice. This course takes you through hundreds of real interview problems, categorizes them by pattern, and teaches you how to think like a FAANG engineer when solving algorithmic challenges.
body:
Transform from coding student to interview-ready engineer.

Who This Course Is For
Engineers preparing for Google, Amazon, Facebook, Netflix, Apple, or Microsoft technical interviews.

What You'll Learn
✅ Master the top 50 LeetCode patterns used in interviews
✅ Solve problems across all difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard)
✅ Learn to communicate your approach to interviewers
✅ Practice under time pressure (similar to real interviews)
✅ Understand trade-offs and edge cases
✅ Build confidence for live coding sessions

Course Outline
Module 1: Sliding Window & Two Pointers
Module 2: Hash Maps & Sets
Module 3: Tree & Graph Patterns
Module 4: Dynamic Programming Basics
Module 5: Mock Interviews with Real Problems
ogTitle: LeetCode Problem Solving & FAANG Interview Prep
ogDescription: Solve real interview problems. Master the patterns that get you hired at Google, Amazon, Meta, Netflix, Apple.

title: System Design Interviews (Scalable Architecture)
summary: Learn to design large-scale systems like Netflix, Uber, Instagram. Master load balancing, caching, databases, and microservices.
description: System design interviews test your ability to architect scalable solutions. This course teaches you how to approach design problems, make trade-offs, and communicate your decisions to experienced engineers.
body:
Think like an architect, not just a coder.

Who This Course Is For
Mid-level and senior engineers interviewing at tech companies; architects wanting to strengthen their design skills.

What You'll Learn
✅ Understand key architectural components (load balancers, caches, databases, queues)
✅ Design systems like URL shortener, social media feed, notification service
✅ Master trade-offs between consistency, availability, and partition tolerance (CAP theorem)
✅ Learn about microservices, monoliths, and when to use each
✅ Estimate capacity and resources (back-of-envelope calculations)
✅ Present your design to experienced senior engineers

Course Outline
Module 1: Scalability Basics & System Components
Module 2: Databases (SQL vs NoSQL, Sharding, Replication)
Module 3: Load Balancing & Caching Strategies
Module 4: Case Studies: Designing Real Systems (URL Shortener, Chat, Video Streaming)
Module 5: Mock System Design Interviews
ogDescription: Master system design for interviews. Learn to architect scalable systems like Netflix, Uber, Instagram.

title: Competitive Programming Mastery
summary: Participate in contests like Codeforces and AtCoder. Learn advanced algorithms and optimization techniques.
description: Competitive programming isn't just for contests—it sharpens your algorithmic thinking and makes you a better engineer. This course covers advanced data structures, mathematical algorithms, and optimization techniques used by contest winners.
body:
Become a champion problem solver.

Who This Course Is For
Algorithm enthusiasts, competitive programmers, and engineers who want to master advanced problem-solving.

What You'll Learn
✅ Advanced data structures (segment trees, Fenwick trees, suffix arrays)
✅ Graph algorithms (Dijkstra, Bellman-Ford, Floyd-Warshall, minimum spanning tree)
✅ Dynamic programming optimization techniques
✅ Number theory and combinatorics basics
✅ Participate in live contests and improve your rating
✅ Learn from editorials of hard problems

Course Outline
Module 1: Advanced Data Structures & Binary Search
Module 2: Graph Algorithms & Trees
Module 3: Dynamic Programming Optimization
Module 4: Number Theory & Combinatorics
Module 5: Contest Strategies & Live Competition
ogDescription: Master advanced algorithms. Compete on Codeforces, AtCoder, and other platforms. Build problem-solving excellence.
prerequisites: Experience with LeetCode or competitive programming

title: Technical Writing Masterclass
summary: Learn to write clear, concise technical documentation. Master API docs, tutorials, and technical blogs that engage engineers.
description: Great software is invisible if nobody understands it. This course teaches you to write documentation, API specifications, and technical tutorials that make complex concepts accessible to other engineers.
body:
Write documentation that engineers actually read and love.

Who This Course Is For
Software engineers, DevOps specialists, tech leads, and product managers who write for technical audiences.

What You'll Learn
✅ Structure technical documentation for clarity
✅ Write effective API documentation and reference guides
✅ Create step-by-step tutorials and how-to guides
✅ Master technical blogging and thought leadership
✅ Edit and refine your writing for impact
✅ Use tools like Markdown, Diagrams, and code examples effectively
✅ Create sample code that actually works

Course Outline
Module 1: Writing Fundamentals for Engineers
Module 2: API Documentation & Reference Guides
Module 3: Tutorials, How-Tos, & Getting Started Guides
Module 4: Technical Blogging & Thought Leadership
Module 5: Tools, Workflows, & Publishing Your Work
ogDescription: Write clear API docs, tutorials, and technical blogs. Master the craft of technical writing.

title: Business Writing & Professional Communication
summary: Master emails, proposals, presentations, and business documents. Communicate with clarity and impact in any professional setting.
description: Your ideas matter, but only if you communicate them well. This course teaches you to write professional emails, persuasive proposals, executive summaries, and business documents that get results.
body:
Communicate with clarity. Influence with impact.

Who This Course Is For
Professionals who want to improve their written communication, aspiring managers, consultants, and anyone advancing their career.

What You'll Learn
✅ Write clear, concise professional emails
✅ Create persuasive business proposals and contracts
✅ Draft executive summaries for decision-makers
✅ Present complex information simply
✅ Adapt your tone for different audiences (clients, executives, teams)
✅ Use structure and formatting for readability
✅ Edit ruthlessly for clarity
✅ Build credibility through professional writing

Course Outline
Module 1: Professional Communication Fundamentals
Module 2: Email Mastery & Correspondence
Module 3: Business Proposals & Contracts
Module 4: Executive Summaries & Reports
Module 5: Presentation Decks & Visual Communication
ogDescription: Master professional communication. Write emails, proposals, reports that get results.

title: Content Writing & Copywriting for Web
summary: Write compelling web copy that converts. Learn copywriting formulas, storytelling, and content marketing strategies.
description: Words sell. This course teaches you copywriting techniques used by the world's best marketers to create content that engages readers, builds trust, and drives conversions.
body:
Write words that make people take action.

Who This Course Is For
Marketers, freelancers, entrepreneurs, and content creators who want to write copy that converts.

What You'll Learn
✅ Understand copywriting psychology and principles
✅ Write attention-grabbing headlines
✅ Craft email sequences that convert
✅ Write landing pages and sales pages
✅ Master storytelling for sales and engagement
✅ Optimize copy for different platforms (email, social, web)
✅ Analyze what works and iterate
✅ Build a portfolio of high-converting copy

Course Outline
Module 1: Copywriting Fundamentals & Psychology
Module 2: Headlines, Subject Lines, & Hooks
Module 3: Email Sequences & Sales Copy
Module 4: Landing Pages & Sales Pages
Module 5: Content Strategy & Multi-Channel Writing
ogDescription: Write copy that converts. Learn copywriting formulas used by top marketers and entrepreneurs.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
summary: Learn user-centered design principles. Master Figma, wireframing, prototyping, and creating interfaces users love.
description: User experience is everything. This course teaches you to design interfaces that are both beautiful and functional. You'll learn design thinking, research methods, and use Figma to create prototypes that delight users.
body:
Design interfaces that users love and businesses need.

Who This Course Is For
Beginning designers, frontend developers wanting to strengthen design skills, and anyone interested in UX.

What You'll Learn
✅ Master user-centered design principles
✅ Conduct user research and create personas
✅ Wireframe and prototype in Figma
✅ Understand design systems and components
✅ Apply typography, color theory, and layout principles
✅ Test designs with users
✅ Build a professional portfolio

Course Outline
Module 1: Design Thinking & User Research
Module 2: Wireframing & Information Architecture
Module 3: Visual Design Principles (Color, Typography, Layout)
Module 4: Prototyping & Interaction Design in Figma
Module 5: Design Systems & Collaboration
ogDescription: Master UX design principles and Figma. Create interfaces that users love and businesses need.

title: Advanced UI/UX Design & Design Systems
summary: Build professional design systems. Master Figma libraries, accessibility, and advanced prototyping for enterprise products.
description: Scale your design impact. This course teaches you to build design systems that empower teams, create accessible interfaces, and design for enterprise-scale products.
body:
Build design systems. Create scalable, accessible interfaces.

Who This Course Is For
Mid-level designers, design leads, and anyone building products at scale.

What You'll Learn
✅ Design system architecture and component libraries
✅ Create reusable components in Figma
✅ Master accessibility (WCAG, keyboard navigation, screen readers)
✅ Advanced prototyping and interaction design
✅ Design tokens and theming
✅ Collaborate with engineering teams
✅ Document and maintain design systems
✅ A/B testing and data-driven design

Course Outline
Module 1: Design Systems Foundations
Module 2: Building Components & Figma Libraries
Module 3: Accessibility Best Practices
Module 4: Advanced Prototyping & Interactions
Module 5: Design Systems in Practice (Handoff, Documentation, Maintenance)
ogDescription: Build design systems at scale. Master accessibility, components, and design tokens.
prerequisites: Experience with UI/UX design or completion of fundamentals course

title: Graphic Design Essentials
summary: Master visual design fundamentals. Create stunning graphics, posters, social media assets, and branding materials.
description: Visual design is everywhere. This course teaches you the fundamentals of graphic design: color, typography, composition, and tools like Figma and Adobe tools to create professional visual assets.
body:
Create visually stunning designs that communicate effectively.

Who This Course Is For
Creative professionals, freelancers, marketers, and anyone wanting to create professional graphic design assets.

What You'll Learn
✅ Master design fundamentals (balance, contrast, emphasis, unity)
✅ Understand color theory and psychology
✅ Typography for impact and readability
✅ Composition and layout principles
✅ Create social media graphics, posters, and marketing materials
✅ Brand identity and logo design basics
✅ Use Figma and other design tools
✅ Build a professional portfolio

Course Outline
Module 1: Design Fundamentals
Module 2: Color Theory & Psychology
Module 3: Typography & Hierarchy
Module 4: Composition & Layout
Module 5: Practical Projects (Social Media, Posters, Branding)
ogDescription: Learn graphic design fundamentals. Create professional graphics, posters, and branding materials.

title: Personal Branding & Professional Identity
summary: Build your personal brand online. Create a strong LinkedIn presence, portfolio, and thought leadership platform.
description: Your personal brand is your professional asset. This course teaches you how to build a strong online presence, showcase your expertise, and create opportunities through strategic personal branding.
body:
Build your reputation. Create opportunities. Stand out.

Who This Course Is For
Professionals looking to advance careers, freelancers, entrepreneurs, and anyone wanting to build their personal brand.

What You'll Learn
✅ Define your unique value proposition
✅ Create a compelling LinkedIn profile
✅ Build a professional portfolio or personal website
✅ Write an effective personal brand statement
✅ Create and share thought leadership content
✅ Network effectively online
✅ Leverage social media strategically
✅ Measure and iterate your personal brand

Course Outline
Module 1: Personal Branding Foundations
Module 2: LinkedIn Mastery
Module 3: Building Your Portfolio or Personal Site
Module 4: Content Strategy & Thought Leadership
Module 5: Networking & Building Relationships Online
ogDescription: Build your personal brand. Master LinkedIn, create a portfolio, become a thought leader.
